remarks.format: ## Remarks `AutoResetEvent` 允许线程能够相互通信通过发出信号。`AutoResetEvent` allows threads to communicate with each other by signaling. 通常情况下，线程需要对资源的独占访问时使用此类。Typically, you use this class when threads need exclusive access to a resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 线程通过调用等待一个信号上`AutoResetEvent`。A thread waits for a signal by calling on the `AutoResetEvent`. 如果`AutoResetEvent`处于非信号状态，线程被阻塞，等待线程当前控件要发出信号的资源是通过调用可用的资源。If the `AutoResetEvent` is in the non-signaled state, the thread blocks, waiting for the thread that currently controls the resource to signal that the resource is available by calling . 调用`Set`信号`AutoResetEvent`释放等待线程。Calling `Set` signals `AutoResetEvent` to release a waiting thread. `AutoResetEvent` 将保持终止状态直到一个等待线程释放，并自动返回到非信号状态。`AutoResetEvent` remains signaled until a single waiting thread is released, and then automatically returns to the non-signaled state. 如果没有线程处于等待状态，状态将无限期地保持已发出信号。If no threads are waiting, the state remains signaled indefinitely. 如果某个线程调用虽然是在已发出信号状态下，该线程不会阻止。If a thread calls while the is in the signaled state, the thread does not block. 立即释放相应线程并返回到非信号状态。The releases the thread immediately and returns to the non-signaled state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不能保证的每个调用方法将释放一个线程。There is no guarantee that every call to the method will release a thread. 如果两次调用太靠近在一起，以便第二次调用前释放线程发生，只有一个线程被释放。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released. 就像第二次调用未发生。It is as if the second call did not happen. 此外，如果时没有等待的线程调用和已终止，则调用不起作用。Also, if is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用同步两个线程的活动。The following example uses an to synchronize the activities of two threads. 第一个线程，这是应用程序线程，执行`Main`。The first thread, which is the application thread, executes `Main`. 它将值写入到受保护的资源，即`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 名为字段`number`。It writes values to the protected resource, which is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) field named `number`. 第二个线程执行静态`ThreadProc`方法，读取写入的值`Main`。The second thread executes the static `ThreadProc` method, which reads the values written by `Main`. `ThreadProc`方法等待。The `ThreadProc` method waits for the . 当`Main`调用方法，则`ThreadProc`方法读取一个值。When `Main` calls the method on the , the `ThreadProc` method reads one value. 立即重置，因此`ThreadProc`方法将再次等待。The immediately resets, so the `ThreadProc` method waits again. 程序逻辑可保证`ThreadProc`方法永远不会读取相同的值两次。The program logic guarantees that the `ThreadProc` method will never read the same value two times. 它并不保证`ThreadProc`方法将读取编写的每个值`Main`。It does not guarantee that the `ThreadProc` method will read every value written by `Main`. 确保这一点需要第二个锁。That guarantee would require a second lock. 每个写入操作之后,`Main`通过调用将产生方法，以让人可以执行的第二个线程。After each write operation, `Main` yields by calling the method, to give the second thread a chance to execute. 否则为在单处理器计算机`Main`将写入多个值之间任何两个读取操作。Otherwise, on a single-processor computer `Main` would write many values between any two read operations. remarks.format: ## Remarks Set 方法释放一个线程。The Set method releases a single thread. 如果没有等待线程，则等待句柄保持终止状态，直到某个线程尝试等待它，或调用其重置方法。If there are no waiting threads, the wait handle remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it, or until its Reset method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 则不能保证每次调用 Set 方法将释放一个线程。There is no guarantee that every call to the Set method will release a thread. 如果两次调用太靠近在一起，以便第二次调用前释放线程发生，只有一个线程被释放，因为如果第二个调用并未发生。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released — as if the second call did not happen. 此外，有没有线程在等待时，如果调用 Set 方法和已终止，则调用不起作用。Also, if the Set method is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect.
